hero.name: Edris Jebran
hero.tagline: Software Development Engineer II • AI/ML Enthusiast • Full-Stack Developer

about.summary: Software Development Engineer II with 4+ years' experience building reliable, scalable systems. Passionate about AI/ML, distributed systems, and creating innovative solutions that solve real-world problems. Strengths in distributed/event-driven design, clean code, and production ownership.
skills: AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, SQS, SNS, DynamoDB, S3, Fargate)

highlights: Designed a safety feature for the Staffing System used in warehouses which reduced the incidence of musculoskeletal injury
Contributed to backend and UI features (Java, AWS, React) with cross-functional partners
Participated in code reviews and testing. Supported production operations and troubleshooting
Worked on distributed systems and event-driven architecture
Applied 3+ years of AWS/Amazon stack experience to build reliable, scalable systems
Worked on CyberMapper (SDN software) in a cybersecurity/SDN context
Contributed across the stack (C++/React); collaborated on performance and responsiveness improvements
Developed software for Software-Defined Networking and cybersecurity applications
Applied low-level programming skills in C++ for network performance optimization
Collaborated with team on system architecture and implementation
Led a team of six engineers to solve landmine clearance for the Hult Prize 2018
Reached regional finals, top 300 out of 100,000 teams worldwide
Researched and developed drone-based landmine clearance technology
Demonstrated leadership, project management, and innovative problem-solving skills
Coordinated cross-functional team efforts and presented solutions to judges

details: Relevant Courses: Machine Learning, Computer Vision, AI, Distributed Systems, Cybersecurity
Diploma of Collegial Studies (DEC), Honors Pure & Applied Sciences (2016)
Strong foundation in parallel computing, AI/ML, and system design

hobbies.name: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu
hobbies.desc: Blue belt practitioner. Teaches discipline, problem-solving under pressure, and strategic thinking. Regular training focusing on technique and continuous improvement.

hobbies.name: AI/ML Enthusiast
hobbies.desc: Passionate about AI/ML technologies and their applications. Completed personal projects in computer vision, parallel computing, and signal processing. Always learning and exploring new developments in the field.

hobbies.name: Fitness & Wellness
hobbies.desc: Strength training and conditioning. Maintaining peak physical and mental performance. Enjoys staying active and healthy through regular exercise routines.

achievements: Designed safety features reducing musculoskeletal injury in Amazon warehouses
Led team to Hult Prize regional finals (top 300 out of 100,000 teams worldwide)
Built distributed systems and event-driven architectures at Amazon scale
Developed AI/ML applications including face detection and parallel computing
Applied 3+ years of AWS/Amazon stack experience in production environments
Demonstrated expertise in C++, Java, Python, and modern web technologies

projects.name: Parallel Computing using CUDA
projects.description: Implemented Rectify, Max Pooling, Convolution and Matrix Inversion operations using CUDA C
projects.impact: Parallelized alpha-beta pruning algorithm for board games, achieving significant speedup

projects.name: Blind Source Separation
projects.description: Convert audio signals to digital and implement BSS to separate mixed signal components
projects.impact: Successfully separated mixed audio signals into their original components

projects.name: Face Detection Application
projects.description: AI-powered application to detect faces in images and correctly tag them
projects.impact: Demonstrated practical application of AI/ML in computer vision
